messages.message:
Ok so looks like the doc viewer is constrained in the range `700px` to `1200px` max width.

@joshbronko What is your screen resolution?
I normally run on 4k monitors or 2.5k on my macbook 2560x1600
I dont think we need to have a max value on the doc viewer

Ok I can see the issue in 2560 and higher resolutions, it doesn't go beyond half the page. I think the max value was added so the chat panel doesn't get too narrow for the text so start overflowing. The current range of max and min values work good for smaller resolutions but do not fit well with higher resolutions.

I agree this should be fixed so it handles higher  resolutions better - probably could try using a max percentage instead of absolute pixels
@alagu @tj.serkes - can we relook at the relative sizing constraints of chat window and page viewer for 2560 and higher resolutions? Thanks.
